title: movie trailer insert font...
content:
Hi Team Typophile,

Does anyone recognise the font attached? I hope so!  
Could it be two fonts in one - the 'S' and 'C' don't compliment each other.  
 - Many thanks in advance...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141006044013im_/http:/typophile.com/files/image_font_5228.jpg)
author: Rand

comments.content: Can't find a match for the complete lettering. You're right, that could be a mash-up. /C, /O and /G look very " [Avant-Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20141006044013/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic) and the rest close to [Aviano Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20141006044013/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/aviano-sans), [Idlewid](http://web.archive.org/web/20141006044013/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/idlewild/overview) or [Syncopate](http://web.archive.org/web/20141006044013/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Syncopate). Still searching...
Many many thanks - I thought as much and I agree with your suggestions!
